page.title: 20POPULATION
page.content: There are a few outlying farms and cottages but the bulk of the population lives in one of the three villages. {Warmington} has some 300 houses. The current electoral roll lists 607 people over the age of 18. It is estimated that the total population is about 800, a figure that has remained quite steady over a number of years. Enquiries indicate that there are four residents with ages of over 90 years. {Fotheringhay} is a much smaller place with about 200 residents. Only a small part of {Tansor} is in the block covered by this part of the survey. This is also quite a small village.
